entry.title: 15 Tea Hat Petits Fours (Only available through Mother's Day - Shipping First Week of May) Hurry they won't last long!!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Divine Delights
Type: Petits Fours
Price: 78.35

Our tea hats begin with a shortbread cookie topped with delicious layers of moist cake. Next they are covered with chocolate and adorned with a hand cut flower fashioned from chocolate fondant. Varieties include; Chocolate Mint, Banana and Coconut Creme, Raspberry, and Lime, 15 confections are presented in an elegant gift box and tied with a beautiful bow. (13ozs.)

(All Petits Fours must be shipped UPS 2nd Day.  2-Day Refrigerated Shipping Fee is included in price.)

entry.title: Demi Tasse Party Packages Petits Fours Box of 36
entry.summary:
Vendor: Divine Delights
Type: Petits Fours
Price: 82.85

Yummy little cakes perfect for Tea Parties - Bridal Events - Birthdays and more!

Almond Cake Petit Four with Raspberry Puree
Almond Cake Petit Four with Orange Buttercream
Almond Cake Petit Four with Pineapple Puree
Almond Cake Petit Four with Lime Buttercream Filling
Chocolate Cake Petit Four with Truffle Cream Filling
Vanilla Cake Petit Four with Strawberry Buttercream
All finished with Pastel Chocolate and tiny Bows

(All Petits Fours must be shipped UPS 2nd Day.  2-Day Refrigerated Shipping Fee is included in price.)

entry.title: Demitasse Wedding Bleu Petit Fours Party Cakes Box of 36 - Returning in April
entry.summary:
Vendor: Divine Delights
Type: Petits Fours
Price: 82.85

Wedding packages enrobed in a delicate robin egg blue chocolate and tied up with an ivory bow. These luscious little vanilla cakes are layered with raspberry puree and vanilla buttercream.

(All Petits Fours must be shipped UPS 2nd Day.  2-Day Refrigerated Shipping Fee is included in price.)

entry.title: Demitasse Wedding Petits Fours Box of 36
entry.summary:
Vendor: Divine Delights
Type: Petits Fours
Price: 82.85

Ivory "Packages": Vanilla Cake Petit Four filled with Raspberry Puree and Vanilla Buttercream
Lily of the Valley: Vanilla Cake Petit Four filled with Strawberry Creme
Dainty Flower: Vanilla Cake Petit Four filled with Bittersweet Truffle Cream

( 2-Day Refrigerated Shipping Fee is required on all Petits Fours. An additional $14.00 fee has been added into the price ($55.90) already to cover the freight plus regular shipping of $12.95 paid at check out covers the $26.95 UPS 2nd Day charges. All Petits Fours will ship with ice packs UPS 2nd Day to ensure they do not stay in transit too long to preserve shape and freshness.)

entry.title: The Classic Packages Petits Fours Box of 35 - Returning in June!

Vendor: Divine Delights
Type: Petits Fours

These yummy packages are finished with beautiful pastels, handsome mochas, and chocolates, and carefully trimmed with delicate ribbons, bows, and flowers. Includes: White Chocolate, Strawberry, Luscious Lemon, Mocha, Triple Chocolate, Pineapple, and Raspberry Creme.

( 2-Day Refrigerated Shipping Fee is required on all Petits Fours.
